Text.Page:
Not far from here is another scout, {@LinkCreature:203#1010#Rasima}. She's as tough as they come, but she's all alone.

She'd never ask for help, she's all into having altitude, but she'll take it if it's offered. And bring her something to drink!

Yes, I'm all aloneâ€”now. My partner, Keleth, and I were discovered while scouting around. We fought hard, but he bought my escape with his life.

I honor his sacrifice but need a favor. Bring back his {@LinkCreature:203#1029#ring} that I might return them to his home and thank his family.
(The corpse was clearly savaged in battle. Nothing stands out except a simple copper ring.)

I remember this ring. Keleth was very proud of such a humble band.

This is perfect. Such a token will mean much to his loved ones. Thank you for this. May the Shieldmaiden protect you in all your battles!
